verses.verse: Maschil <WH4905> of Ethan<WH387> the Ezrahite.<WH250> I will sing<WH7891> of the mercies<WH2617> of the LORD<WH3068> forever:<WH5769> with my mouth<WH6310> will I make known<WH3045> thy faithfulness<WH530> to all generations.<WH1755> <WH1755>
For <WH3588> I have said,<WH559> Mercy<WH2617> shall be built up<WH1129> forever:<WH5769> thy faithfulness<WH530> shalt thou establish<WH3559> in the very heavens.<WH8064>
I have made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with my chosen,<WH972> I have sworn<WH7650> unto David<WH1732> my servant,<WH5650>
Thy seed<WH2233> will I establish<WH3559> forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> and build up<WH1129> thy throne<WH3678> to all generations.<WH1755> <WH1755> Selah.<WH5542>
And the heavens<WH8064> shall praise<WH3034> thy wonders,<WH6382> O LORD:<WH3068> thy faithfulness<WH530> also<WH637> in the congregation<WH6951> of the saints.<WH6918>
For <WH3588> who<WH4310> in the heaven<WH7834> can be compared<WH6186> unto the LORD?<WH3068> who among the sons<WH1121> of the mighty<WH410> can be likened<WH1819> unto the LORD?<WH3068>
God <WH410> is greatly<WH7227> to be feared<WH6206> in the assembly<WH5475> of the saints,<WH6918> and to be had in reverence<WH3372> of<WH5921> all<WH3605> them that are about<WH5439> him.
O LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts,<WH6635> who<WH4310> is a strong<WH2626> LORD<WH3050> like unto thee?<WH3644> or to thy faithfulness<WH530> round about<WH5439> thee?
Thou <WH859> rulest<WH4910> the raging<WH1348> of the sea:<WH3220> when the waves<WH1530> thereof arise,<WH7721> thou<WH859> stillest<WH7623> them.
Thou <WH859> hast broken<WH1792> Rahab<WH7294> in pieces, as one that is slain;<WH2491> thou hast scattered<WH6340> thine enemies<WH341> with thy strong<WH5797> arm.<WH2220>
The heavens<WH8064> are thine, the earth<WH776> also<WH637> is thine: as for the world<WH8398> and the fullness<WH4393> thereof, thou<WH859> hast founded<WH3245> them.
The north<WH6828> and the south<WH3225> thou<WH859> hast created<WH1254> them: Tabor<WH8396> and Hermon<WH2768> shall rejoice<WH7442> in thy name.<WH8034>
Thou hast a mighty<WH1369> arm:<WH2220> strong<WH5810> is thy hand,<WH3027> and high<WH7311> is thy right hand.<WH3225>
Justice <WH6664> and judgment<WH4941> are the habitation<WH4349> of thy throne:<WH3678> mercy<WH2617> and truth<WH571> shall go<WH6923> before thy face.<WH6440>
Blessed <WH835> is the people<WH5971> that know<WH3045> the joyful sound:<WH8643> they shall walk,<WH1980> O LORD,<WH3068> in the light<WH216> of thy countenance.<WH6440>
In thy name<WH8034> shall they rejoice<WH1523> all<WH3605> the day:<WH3117> and in thy righteousness<WH6666> shall they be exalted.<WH7311>
For <WH3588> thou<WH859> art the glory<WH8597> of their strength:<WH5797> and in thy favor<WH7522> our horn<WH7161> shall be exalted.<WH7311>
For <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> is our defense;<WH4043> and the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478> is our king.<WH4428>

Then <WH227> thou spakest<WH1696> in vision<WH2377> to thy holy one,<WH2623> and saidst,<WH559> I have laid<WH7737> help<WH5828> upon<WH5921> one that is mighty;<WH1368> I have exalted<WH7311> one chosen<WH970> out of the people.<WH4480> <WH5971>
I have found<WH4672> David<WH1732> my servant;<WH5650> with my holy<WH6944> oil<WH8081> have I anointed<WH4886> him:
With <WH5973> whom<WH834> my hand<WH3027> shall be established:<WH3559> mine arm<WH2220> also<WH637> shall strengthen<WH553> him.
The enemy<WH341> shall not<WH3808> exact<WH5378> upon him; nor<WH3808> the son<WH1121> of wickedness<WH5766> afflict<WH6031> him.
And I will beat down<WH3807> his foes<WH6862> before his face,<WH4480> <WH6440> and plague<WH5062> them that hate<WH8130> him.
But my faithfulness<WH530> and my mercy<WH2617> shall be with<WH5973> him: and in my name<WH8034> shall his horn<WH7161> be exalted.<WH7311>
I will set<WH7760> his hand<WH3027> also in the sea,<WH3220> and his right hand<WH3225> in the rivers.<WH5104>
He <WH1931> shall cry<WH7121> unto me, Thou<WH859> art my father,<WH1> my God,<WH410> and the rock<WH6697> of my salvation.<WH3444>
Also <WH637> I<WH589> will make<WH5414> him my firstborn,<WH1060> higher<WH5945> than the kings<WH4428> of the earth.<WH776>
My mercy<WH2617> will I keep<WH8104> for him forevermore,<WH5769> and my covenant<WH1285> shall stand fast<WH539> with him.
His seed<WH2233> also will I make<WH7760> to endure forever,<WH5703> and his throne<WH3678> as the days<WH3117> of heaven.<WH8064>
If <WH518> his children<WH1121> forsake<WH5800> my law,<WH8451> and walk<WH1980> not<WH3808> in my judgments;<WH4941>
If <WH518> they break<WH2490> my statutes,<WH2708> and keep<WH8104> not<WH3808> my commandments;<WH4687>
Then will I visit<WH6485> their transgression<WH6588> with the rod,<WH7626> and their iniquity<WH5771> with stripes.<WH5061>
Nevertheless my lovingkindness<WH2617> will I not<WH3808> utterly take<WH6331> from<WH4480> <WH5973> him, nor<WH3808> suffer my faithfulness to fail.<WH8266> <WH530>
My covenant<WH1285> will I not<WH3808> break,<WH2490> nor<WH3808> alter<WH8138> the thing that is gone out<WH4161> of my lips.<WH8193>
Once <WH259> have I sworn<WH7650> by my holiness<WH6944> that I will not<WH518> lie<WH3576> unto David.<WH1732>
His seed<WH2233> shall endure<WH1961> forever,<WH5769> and his throne<WH3678> as the sun<WH8121> before<WH5048> me.
It shall be established<WH3559> forever<WH5769> as the moon,<WH3394> and as a faithful<WH539> witness<WH5707> in heaven.<WH7834> Selah.<WH5542>
But thou<WH859> hast cast off<WH2186> and abhorred,<WH3988> thou hast been wroth<WH5674> with<WH5973> thine anointed.<WH4899>
Thou hast made void<WH5010> the covenant<WH1285> of thy servant:<WH5650> thou hast profaned<WH2490> his crown<WH5145> by casting it to the ground.<WH776>
Thou hast broken down<WH6555> all<WH3605> his hedges;<WH1448> thou hast brought<WH7760> his strongholds<WH4013> to ruin.<WH4288>
All <WH3605> that pass by<WH5674> the way<WH1870> spoil<WH8155> him: he is<WH1961> a reproach<WH2781> to his neighbors.<WH7934>
Thou hast set up<WH7311> the right hand<WH3225> of his adversaries;<WH6862> thou hast made all<WH3605> his enemies<WH341> to rejoice.<WH8055>
Thou hast also<WH637> turned<WH7725> the edge<WH6697> of his sword,<WH2719> and hast not<WH3808> made him to stand<WH6965> in the battle.<WH4421>
Thou hast made his glory<WH4480> <WH2892> to cease,<WH7673> and cast<WH4048> his throne<WH3678> down to the ground.<WH776>
The days<WH3117> of his youth<WH5934> hast thou shortened:<WH7114> thou hast covered<WH5844> <WH5921> him with shame.<WH955> Selah.<WH5542>
How long,<WH5704> <WH4100> LORD?<WH3068> wilt thou hide thyself<WH5641> forever?<WH5331> shall thy wrath<WH2534> burn<WH1197> like<WH3644> fire?<WH784>
Remember <WH2142> how<WH4100> short<WH2465> my<WH589> time is: wherefore<WH5921> <WH4100> hast thou made<WH1254> all<WH3605> men<WH1121> <WH120> in vain?<WH7723>

What <WH4310> man<WH1397> is he that liveth,<WH2421> and shall not<WH3808> see<WH7200> death?<WH4194> shall he deliver<WH4422> his soul<WH5315> from the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of the grave?<WH7585> Selah.<WH5542>
Lord, <WH136> where<WH346> are thy former<WH7223> lovingkindnesses,<WH2617> which thou swarest<WH7650> unto David<WH1732> in thy truth?<WH530>
Remember, <WH2142> Lord,<WH136> the reproach<WH2781> of thy servants;<WH5650> how I do bear<WH5375> in my bosom<WH2436> the reproach of all<WH3605> the mighty<WH7227> people;<WH5971>
Wherewith <WH834> thine enemies<WH341> have reproached,<WH2778> O LORD;<WH3068> wherewith<WH834> they have reproached<WH2778> the footsteps<WH6119> of thine anointed.<WH4899>
Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD<WH3068> forevermore.<WH5769> Amen,<WH543> and Amen.<WH543>
